resources.string: This feature requires a barcode scanner. Install the ZXing Barcode Scanner?
You will be directed to the Zotero.org site to a create new API key or select an existing key from a list.
You will be directed to the Zotero.org site to register a new account.

To use Scan2Zotero you need to enter your Zotero user ID and API key. These are different from your username and password, and allow you to finely control the level of access Scan2Zotero has to your library.
